prod_short_desc: Set out on time-traveling adventures with Cyberman™ from Doctor Who!
prod_long_desc:
Upgrade your LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ gameplay experience with the buildable Cyberman™ Fun Pack. Place the drone-like humanoid on the LEGO® Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his hi-tech abilities to solve puzzles and take on the enemies in true Doctor Who style. Add the 3-in-1 Dalek to boost your gameplay, and rebuild it into a Fire ‘n Ride Dalek and Silver Shooter Dalek for upgraded in-game abilities. This set includes a buildable Cyberman minifigure.
Includes a buildable Cyberman™ minifigure and 3-in-1 Dalek with a detachable LEGO® Toy Tag.
Rebuild the 3-in-1 Dalek and rebuild it into a Fire ‘n Ride Dalek and Silver Shooter Dalek for upgraded in-game abilities.
Place Cyberman™ and his 3-in-1 model on the LEGO® Toy Pad and set out on exciting in-game adventures.
Activate Cyberman’s special Mind Control, Hacking, Drone, X-Ray Vision, Silver LEGO Blowup, Technology and Dive abilities to solve puzzles and battle enemies.
Collect your favorite LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ characters and use them in-game together for a crazy mash-up multiverse.
Visit LEGO.com/DIMENSIONS for more information on this exciting LEGO® building and video-gaming experience. Ask your parents’ permission before going online.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ Starter Pack and internet connection required.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ expansion packs unlock additional content.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ characters and vehicles are required to interact with LEGO DIMENSIONS video game.
Dalek stands over 2” tall (alternative 3-in-1 builds vary in size).
